it.polimi.se2019.client.gui

Class PlayerBoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.PlayerBoardController

  • public class PlayerBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
    The PlayerBoardControler is the controller of the the player board. It provides methods to link a player's data to its graphic counterpart.
    Author:
    andreahuang

      • getPlayerBoardImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getPlayerBoardImage(PlayerColor playerColor,
                                                    java.lang.String mode)
        The getPlayerBoardImage gets the image of the playerBoard according to the client's assigned color.
        Parameters:
        playerColor - is the client's color.
        mode - is the mode of the current game.
        Returns:
        the correct image of the player board.
